description:
Nova is now back in Hikaru`s heart where she belongs. With her dying breath, Alcyone unveils Debonair`s location: Cephiro`s alternate realm. The Magic Knights and their Rune Gods are ready to end the struggle once and for all...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le chemin de la victoire ! L`avenir appartient à ceux qui ont la foi !
Shouri e no Michi! Shinjiru Kokoro ga Hiraku Asu!
The Path to Victory! A Tomorrow that a Believing Heart Opens!
勝利への道! 信じる心が開く明日!
